page.title: 04Leisure
page.content: There are 1,160 acres of parks, open spaces and playing fields on 63 different sites.There is an athletics track with complete athletics facilities as well as a gym for weight lifting and keep fit.An all-weather track is being built at the moment.There are four squash courts in Solihull, three tennis clubs and two golf courses. There is a swimming pool called Tudor Grange Pool.At the moment it has two pools and a solarium.There are plans for another pool to be added and a huge water slide.There are numerous football and rugby clubs.One of the oldest is Silhill F.C.
